login.termsContent: Please read the following terms carefully. Using this extension indicates your agreement to comply with the relevant terms.
login.agreeTerms: I have read and agree to the terms of use
login.setupCompleteMessage: Congratulations! You have successfully configured the extension and can now start using it.
login.preloadingDesc: Caching your data in the background to improve experience...
login.dataCacheDesc: For the best user experience, we recommend caching your data now
login.cacheAdvantage1: Data ready on first visit, no waiting required
login.cacheAdvantage2: View cached data even when offline
login.cacheAdvantage3: Reduce API calls and improve response speed
login.cachingDataDesc: Caching your Twitter and wallet data, please wait...
login.cachingCompleteDesc: Data caching is complete, you can now proceed to the next step!
login.cachingProgressDesc: Fetching and caching your data from the server
login.cachingSuccessDesc: All data has been successfully cached locally
login.cachingInProgress: Caching data in progress, please wait...
login.cachingNote: Caching process may take a few minutes depending on your data volume
login.tokenDescription: Enter your authorization token to access extension features
login.tokenHelp: Please enter your API token. You can get your token by visiting @Tw3Track_bot on Telegram.
login.tokenSecurityInfo: Your token will be securely stored locally and used to authenticate API requests. Token format should be: Bearer [your-token-here]
login.verifyingDescription: Verifying your authorization token and retrieving account information
login.verifyingWait: Please wait while we verify your token...
login.verificationSuccessDescription: Your token has been successfully verified!
login.verificationFailedDescription: There was a problem verifying your token
login.accountDescription: Your account details and subscription information
login.languageDescription: Select your preferred extension interface language
login.languageHelp: Choose your preferred language. The interface will update immediately.
login.themeDescription: Select your preferred extension interface theme mode
login.themeHelp: Choose your preferred theme. The interface will update immediately to show a preview.
login.themeLightDesc: Always use bright colors and high contrast light mode
login.themeDarkDesc: Always use dark colors and reduced eye strain dark mode
login.themeAutoDesc: Automatically switch between light and dark based on system preference
login.termsDescription: Please read and accept the terms of use to continue
login.termsAndPrivacy: Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
login.termsReadCarefully: Please read the following terms carefully before proceeding
login.privacyPrinciples: Your privacy and data security are our top priorities. This extension operates under the following principles:
login.dataStoredLocally: All data is stored locally on your device
login.tokensEncrypted: API tokens are encrypted and never shared with third parties
login.noPersonalInfo: No personal information is collected without consent
login.canDeleteData: You can delete all data at any time through settings
login.byUsingExtension: By using this extension, you agree to:
login.termsAcknowledge: Checking this box indicates that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms.
login.privacyIntro: At Tw3Track, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we handle information when you use our browser extension and services.
login.dataCollectionDesc: We do not collect, store, or transmit any personal information or sensitive browser data. Our extension runs locally on your device and respects your privacy.
login.noBrowsingHistory: We do not access your browsing history
login.noPersonalInfoCollection: We do not collect personal information
login.noOnlineTracking: We do not track your online activities
login.noSensitiveBrowserInfo: We do not access sensitive browser information
login.localDataProcessing: All data processing is done locally on your device
login.localDataStorageDesc: Any notes or annotations you create are stored locally in your browser. You have complete control over this data and can export or delete it at any time.
login.userNotesDataUsageDesc: When you use Twitter notes or wallet notes features, your note content may be used to improve plugin data display, enhance service functionality, and provide better user experience. This includes using your note data to improve data accuracy, develop new features, and optimize overall service quality. Using these features indicates your consent to this data usage.
login.openSourceTransparencyDesc: Our extension is completely open source and auditable. You can review our code at any time to verify our privacy practices.
login.termsAcceptanceDesc: By downloading, installing, or using the Tw3Track browser extension, you agree to be bound by these terms of service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.
login.serviceDescriptionDesc: Tw3Track is a browser extension that provides Web3 Twitter analysis, wallet tracking, and note-taking features. The service is provided as-is, and we reserve the right to modify or discontinue features at any time.
login.noIllegalActivities: Do not use the service for illegal or harmful activities
login.respectUserPrivacy: Respect the privacy and rights of other users
login.maintainAccountSecurity: Maintain the security of your account and data
login.prohibitedUseEnforcementDesc: Any illegal, fraudulent, abusive, or harmful use of the service is strictly prohibited. We reserve the absolute right to immediately suspend, blacklist, or permanently ban any user account without prior notice or explanation. This includes but is not limited to illegal activities, service abuse, terms violations, or any behavior we deem inappropriate.
login.accountSuspensionBanningDesc: We have the sole discretion to determine what constitutes a violation of these terms. Upon discovering any prohibited use, we may immediately and permanently ban your account, revoke access to all services, and forfeit any remaining subscription benefits without refund or compensation.
login.dataUsageRightsDesc: By using our note features (Twitter notes and wallet notes), you grant us the right to use your note content to improve our services, enhance data accuracy, and develop new features. This usage helps us provide better services for all users.
login.serviceLimitationsDesc: We strive to provide our services. We do not guarantee 100% uptime, data accuracy, or availability. Free users have usage limitations as specified in our pricing plans.
login.paymentRefundPolicyDesc: All premium subscription payments are final and non-refundable. We do not provide any form of refunds, credits, or prorated billing, including but not limited to service dissatisfaction, unused subscription periods, or account termination.
login.disclaimerDesc: The service is provided on an as-is and as-available basis without any express or implied warranties. We disclaim all warranties, including but not limited to merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.
login.liabilityLimitationDesc: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, data, or business opportunities arising from your use of the service.
login.finalInterpretationRightsDesc: The company reserves the final right to interpret and explain all terms and conditions of this agreement. In case of any disputes or ambiguities, the company's interpretation shall prevail and be binding. All decisions regarding service use, account status, and terms violations are at the company's sole discretion.
login.contactInformationDesc: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or terms of service, please contact us through our official channels or GitHub repository.
login.configuredSettings: Your extension has been configured with the following settings
login.thankYou: Thank you for choosing our extension! üéâ
login.clickGetStarted: Click "Get Started" to close this setup and return to the extension
login.accessDashboard: Access the dashboard through the extension popup
login.exploreFeatures: Explore Web3 trends and custom settings
login.changePreferences: You can change language and theme preferences in settings at any time
login.complianceWithLaws: Use the extension in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations
login.noReverseEngineering: Do not attempt to reverse engineer or modify the extension
login.respectRateLimits: Respect API rate limits and usage quotas
login.noMaliciousUse: Do not use the extension for any malicious or harmful activities
login.keepTokensSecure: Keep your API tokens secure and do not share them with others
login.apiUsageDesc: This extension connects to external APIs to provide its functionality. Please ensure you have proper authorization to use these APIs and comply with their terms of service.
login.dataBackupDesc: While we store data locally for security, we recommend backing up important configurations. The extension provides export/import functionality in settings.
login.contactSupportDesc: If you have any questions about these terms or need support, please contact us through:
login.scrollToRead: Please scroll down to read the complete terms
login.readComplete: You have read the complete terms of use
login.pleaseScrollFirst: Please scroll down to read the complete terms first
login.twitterSettingsDescription: Configure how the extension interacts with Twitter/X pages
login.twitterAutoQueryDescription: Automatically display KOL data when visiting Twitter user profiles
login.autoQueryExplanation: When enabled, the extension will automatically display relevant data on Twitter user profile pages
login.featureDescription1: Automatically display KOL data when visiting any Twitter user profile
login.featureDescription2: Data cached for 10 seconds to improve performance
login.featureDescription3: You can toggle this feature in popup settings at any time
login.dexPlatformSettingsDescription: Select default DEX platforms for each network for quick trading jumps
login.evmNetworkDesc: Including Ethereum, Base, BSC and other networks
login.dexSettingsNote1: EVM networks will show multiple platform options, other networks use default platforms
login.dexSettingsNote2: These preferences can be modified in settings at any time
login.dexSettingsNote3: These settings will be used for wallet address detection and block explorer injection features
